column2: You can retire from your life as a ruler for a month to train your combat skills.
You have completed your month of training and have made some small progress on your duelling skills.
You have completed your month of training and have made some progress on your duelling skills.
You have completed your month of training and have made moderate progress on your duelling skills.
You have completed your month of training and have made no progress on your duelling skills while also injuring yourself.
You have completed your month of training and have made some great progress on your duelling skills.
You have completed your month of training and have made massive strides on your duelling skills.
You have completed your month of training and can now be considered a fully fledged duelist, though additional training won't hurt your skills.
